H0.text: In which country was the first 24 hour race for motor cars held on a closed course, in 1907. France

H1.text: In which country was the first 24 hour race for motor cars held on a closed course, in 1907. United Kingdom

H2.text: In which country was the first 24 hour race for motor cars held on a closed course, in 1907. Italy

H3.text: In which country was the first 24 hour race for motor cars held on a closed course, in 1907. Sasana

A4.text: Since 1923, this route has been used for the famous 24 Hours of Le Mans sports car endurance race.
